name: Farmer
description: You know the hard work of the farm and field. You understand the cycle of seasons and the patience required to nurture crops and livestock.
feature_description: Since you come from the ranks of the common folk, you fit in among them with ease. You can find a place to hide, rest, or recuperate among other commoners, especially in rural areas.

name: Soldier
description: War has been your life for as long as you care to remember.
feature_description: You have a military rank from your career as a soldier. Soldiers loyal to your former military organization still recognize your authority and influence.
